transArray.content: The service is really good and thoughtful! ğŸ‘ğŸ‘I also love children very much, and specially prepared washing supplies and slippers for children. The hotel's breakfast is rich in variety, and the ingredients are fresh and delicious. There is also a thoughtful free supper, which is really goodğŸ‘The hotel environment is also very tidy, and there are some board games in the lobby for everyone to use, which adds to the fun of the journey. In fact, it should be given a 6-star praise! ^_^
